name: Mini-Worlds
description:
Have you ever wanted to play a fun, arena shooter? If so then Mini-Worlds is the game for you!

Mini-Worlds is a top-down arena shooter where you can gather resources, build a base and fight of the corrupted bats!

This game is a MVP (Minimum viable product) of a game that I was working on a while ago so I decided to release it! This game is no longer in development

Controls:

W,A,S,D - Move

Q - Switch between building or shooting modes

Right click - Place block (When in building mode)

Left click - Shoot (When in shooting mode)

Esc - Back to main menu

Recommended specs:

Processor: Intel core i5-2400

GPU: Nvidia GT 710

RAM: 4GB
